rule.name: PreferBuilderPatternChaining
rule.message: Builder pattern methods should be chained instead of using multiple intermediary variable assignments. Use a final variable with chained method calls
rule.description:
When using builder patterns, prefer method chaining over multiple intermediary variable assignments. Use final variables with chained method calls instead of reassigning the same variable multiple times. This follows the builder pattern idiom and improves code clarity.
Version: 1.0.1
